alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS... NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND SOUTH CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Bayard, Switzerland, and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns
